Prey: Insects, small mammals, other spiders, small lizards
Fun Fact: Some huntsman spiders have an interesting way of moving around. Some cartwheel while others do handsprings or backflips.
Estimated Population Size: At least hundreds of thousands worldwide.
Other Name(s): Wood spider, rain spider, lizard eating spider, giant crab spider
Location: Oceania, North, South and Central America, Asia, Africa, north and central Europe and the Mediterranean.
Length: 0.71 inches with a 5.9 inch leg span, though some species are much larger
Name: Huntsman Spider
